messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Need homemade paper recipe, quick
messages.msgSnippet: Karen, We make paper about once a month these days, but I don t have a special recipe. We just use our scrap paper and add things to make it colorful or
messages.messageBody:
Karen,
We make paper about once a month these days, but I don't have a special
recipe.
We just use our scrap paper and add things to make it colorful or
interesting. Our friends sent us some poke salad from Arkansas and we
used the berries in paper making. It was beautiful. Just experiment
and have fun!
Deb L


> We've run out of ideas for Christmas gifts for my mil and we decided
> that we'd try something made with homemade paper. But I've never
> done
> it. I've searched the Internet and gotten a couple of recipes...but
> I'd
> like to get one from someone who's done it before. A tried and true
> one.
>
> Any help out there?
>
> Karen

messages.subject: Need homemade paper recipe, quick
messages.msgSnippet: We ve run out of ideas for Christmas gifts for my mil and we decided that we d try something made with homemade paper.  But I ve never done it.  I ve searched
messages.messageBody:
We've run out of ideas for Christmas gifts for my mil and we decided
that we'd try something made with homemade paper. But I've never done
it. I've searched the Internet and gotten a couple of recipes...but I'd
like to get one from someone who's done it before. A tried and true one.

Any help out there?

Karen
